member.name: T:Abp.Authorization.Roles.AbpRole`1
member.summary: Represents a role in an application. A role is used to group permissions.
member.remarks: Application should use permissions to check if user is granted to perform an operation. Checking 'if a user has a role' is not possible until the role is static (). Static roles can be used in the code and can not be deleted by users. Non-static (dynamic) roles can be added/removed by users and we can not know their name while coding. A user can have multiple roles. Thus, user will have all permissions of all assigned roles.

member.name: P:Abp.Authorization.Roles.AbpRole`1.IsStatic
member.summary: Is this a static role? Static roles can not be deleted, can not change their name. They can be used programmatically.

member.name: P:Abp.Authorization.Roles.AbpRole`1.IsDefault
member.summary: Is this role will be assigned to new users as default?

member.name: P:Abp.Authorization.Roles.AbpRole`1.Permissions
member.summary: List of permissions of the role.

member.param: TenantId or null (if this is not a tenant-level role)

member.summary: Maximum depth of an UO hierarchy.

member.summary: Length of a code unit between dots.

member.name: P:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.Parent
member.summary: Parent . Null, if this OU is root.

member.name: P:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.ParentId
member.summary: Parent Id. Null, if this OU is root.

member.name: P:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.Code
member.summary: Hierarchical Code of this organization unit. Example: "00001.00042.00005". This is a unique code for a Tenant. It's changeable if OU hierarch is changed.

member.name: M:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Tenant's Id or null for host.
Parent's Id or null if OU is a root.

member.name: M:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.CreateCode(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates code for given numbers. Example: if numbers are 4,2 then returns "00004.00002";

member.name: M:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.AppendCode(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends a child code to a parent code. Example: if parentCode = "00001", childCode = "00042" then returns "00001.00042".
member.param: Parent code. Can be null or empty if parent is a root.

member.name: M:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.GetRelativeCode(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets relative code to the parent. Example: if code = "00019.00055.00001" and parentCode = "00019" then returns "00055.00001".

member.name: M:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.CalculateNextCode(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates next code for given code. Example: if code = "00019.00055.00001" returns "00019.00055.00002".

member.name: M:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.GetLastUnitCode(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the last unit code. Example: if code = "00019.00055.00001" returns "00001".

member.name: M:Abp.Organizations.OrganizationUnit.GetParentCode(System.String)
member.summary: Gets parent code. Example: if code = "00019.00055.00001" returns "00019.00055".
